title: 234: Sex, Doshas + Embodiment with Malaika Darville
itunes:title: 234: Sex, Doshas + Embodiment with Malaika Darville
description:
In this episode, I sit down with my Shamanic teacher Malaika Darville to discuss all things empowerment, dharma, finding your path and of course sex + the Doshas.

Malaika made a major impact on my life when I did her facilitator training at 23 and has been a close friend since — I’m so excited to share her with you in this episode!

Check out the other 4 episodes she’s been on on Highest Self Podcast as well!

Malaika is a guest teacher in Rose Gold Goddesses, the sacred sisterhood collective uplifting and connecting you to become your Highest Self —

Be part of a community that supports you discovering your dharma in Rose Gold Goddesses, the sacred sisterhood collective with community, content, creativity and so much more — learn more about rosegoldgoddesses.com.

Learn more about Malaika’s retreats at inmyelements.com

Get 35% off your order of Youveda supplements at youveda.com with code “sahara”

Get 20% off your Organifi Green Juice + Adaptogenic Superfood blends at organifi.com with coupon code "sahara"

Banyan Botanical’s brand-new and super tasty Turmeric Milk Mix includes ashwagandha and other supportive herbs for digestion, circulation, and more. I want you to try it!

Get 20% off my favorite products at banyanbotanicals.com/sahara.

Intro + Outro Music: Silent Ganges by Maneesh de Moor

Discover your Dosha and receive custom results for your mind and body with my free quiz at eatfeelfresh.com/new-quiz

Connect with me for daily Ayurvedic and modern spiritual wisdom at: Instagram.com/iamsahararose
Facebook.com/iamsahararose Twitter.com/iamsahararose

Order My Books Eat Feel Fresh + Idiot's Guide to Ayurveda: https://www.iamsahararose.com/books

This podcast is for educational purposes only. The host claims no responsibility to any person or entity for any liability, loss, or damage caused or alleged to be caused directly or indirectly as a result of the use, application, or interpretation of the information presented herein.
